author: Staff Reporter
text:
Jewellery stolen

A burglar entered a house on Yercaud Main Road in Kondappanaickenpatti and decamped with 15 sovereigns of gold jewellery here on Saturday.

Mohan was running a shop on the house premises and he left for market to purchase products. His wife Chandra was in the shop. Around 12 noon, she heard a noise in the house and went inside.

An unidentified man was taking the valuables from the almirah.

She raised an alarm, but he pushed her down and fled the house. Neighbours informed the Kannankurichi police. A case was registered.
title: House burgled
